00008 #ifndef CACHEABLE_ENUM_HPP
00009 #define CACHEABLE_ENUM_HPP
00010 
00011 #include "CacheableKey.hpp"
00012 #include "CacheableString.hpp"
00013 
00014 namespace gemfire {
00015 
00026   class CPPCACHE_EXPORT CacheableEnum : public CacheableKey {
00027   private:
00028     CacheableStringPtr m_enumClassName;
00029     CacheableStringPtr m_enumName;
00030     int32_t            m_ordinal;
00031     mutable int32_t    m_hashcode;
00032 
00033   public:
00034 
00036     ~CacheableEnum();
00037 
00041     static Serializable* createDeserializable(){
00042       return new CacheableEnum();
00043     }
00047     virtual void toData(DataOutput& output) const;
00048 
00052     virtual Serializable* fromData(DataInput& input);
00053 
00055     virtual uint32_t objectSize() const {
00056       uint32_t size = sizeof( CacheableEnum );
00057       size += sizeof(int32_t);
00058       size += m_enumClassName->objectSize();
00059       size += m_enumName->objectSize();
00060       return size;
00061     }
00062 
00068     virtual int32_t classId() const {
00069       return 0;
00070     }
00071 
00077     virtual int8_t typeId() const {      
00078       return 0;
00079     }
00080 
00084     virtual CacheableStringPtr toString() const {
00085       return CacheableString::create("CacheableEnum");
00086     }
00087 
00095     static CacheableEnumPtr create(const char* enumClassName, const char* enumName, int32_t ordinal) {         
00096       CacheableEnumPtr str( new CacheableEnum(enumClassName, enumName, ordinal));
00097       return str;
00098     }
00099 
00101     const char* getEnumClassName() const {         
00102       return m_enumClassName->asChar();      
00103     }
00104 
00106     const char* getEnumName() const {         
00107       return m_enumName->asChar();      
00108     }
00109 
00111     int32_t getEnumOrdinal() const {         
00112       return m_ordinal;      
00113     } 
00114 
00116     virtual uint32_t hashcode( ) const;
00117 
00119     virtual bool operator==(const CacheableKey& other) const;
00120   protected:
00121     CacheableEnum();
00122     CacheableEnum(const char* enumClassName, const char* enumName, int32_t ordinal);
00123   private:
00124     // never implemented.
00125     void operator =(const CacheableEnum& other);
00126     CacheableEnum(const CacheableEnum& other);
00127 
00128   };  
00129 }
00130 
00131 #endif //CACHEABLE_ENUM_HPP
